general.title: 1. General Information
general.content: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website. We place great importance on protecting our users' privacy and complying with GDPR regulations.

administrator.title: 2. Data Administrator
administrator.content: The administrator of your personal data is RJCode IT Portfolio.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.intro: Our website uses cookies, which are divided into:

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: are essential for the proper functioning of the website. They cannot be disabled as the site would not work correctly.

analytics.title: Analytical cookies
analytics.description: help us understand how users interact with our website, allowing us to improve it.

analytics.title: Analytical cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how users interact with our website

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
Right to withdraw consent at any time

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.content: For matters related to personal data protection, you can contact us through the contact form available on the website.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to make changes to this privacy policy. We will inform you about any changes through the website.
